titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the School of Architecture, Yale University, Records
School of Architecture, Yale University, Records
titlestmt.author: compiled by Daniel Hartwig

publicationstmt.publisher: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Friday January 11, 2019 at 09:42

did.unittitle: School of Architecture, Yale University, records

repository.corpname: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

did.abstract: The records consist of correspondence, course materials, subject files, clippings, faculty records, and minutes of the Rules Committee documenting the Yale School of Architecture and its predecessors.

odd.head: General note
odd.p: Forms part of Yale Record Group 19-A (YRG 19-A), Central records and records of the dean of the School of Architecture.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: The records were transferred from the School of Architecture, 2007-2017; gift of William S. Huff, 2008-2012.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the records is partially restricted due to law, university policy or fragility. Any restricted material will be noted as such.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: School of Architecture, Yale University, Records (RU 1048). Manuscripts and Archives, Yale University Library.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The records are arranged by accession.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The records consist of correspondence, course materials, subject files, clippings, faculty records, and minutes of the Rules Committee documenting the Yale School of Architecture and its predecessors.

did.unittitle: Central records of the School of Architecture
Prospective M.E.D. Students in City Planning/Urban Development
Administrative and Educational records of Walter Harris

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Gift of William S. Huff (M. Arch '52). See folder 2 for descriptions and recollections of Mr. Huff concerning documents in accession.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: The materials are open for research.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The accession contains course evaluations, Spring 2012, A& A Building renovation correspondence, press kits, and faculty promotion and re-appointment materials, 2001-2012.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: The alumni correspondence is restricted until January 1, 2047, as established by actuate="onRequest" show="new" href="http://web.library.yale.edu/mssa/collections/research-use-of-yale-university-archives" Yale Corporation.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: The materials are open for research.
